# Frontend Application

> Astro 5 server-rendered frontend with React 19 interactive components, Tailwind CSS + DaisyUI styling, and TypeScript throughout.

The frontend is built with Astro 5 in SSR mode (Node.js adapter), using React 19 for interactive components (admin editor, chronology timeline). Styling uses Tailwind CSS with the DaisyUI plugin and a custom "silentedge" theme. Content is sourced from a SQLite database at runtime rather than static Markdown files. The project uses TypeScript, astro-icon for iconography, and marked for Markdown rendering.

## Layouts

- [src/layouts/Layout.astro](../layouts/Layout.astro): Base HTML layout with head metadata, scripts, and analytics
- [src/layouts/PageLayout.astro](../layouts/PageLayout.astro): Standard page layout with header and footer
- [src/layouts/BlogLayout.astro](../layouts/BlogLayout.astro): Blog post layout with table of contents and related posts
- [src/layouts/MarkdownLayout.astro](../layouts/MarkdownLayout.astro): Layout for rendering Markdown content pages
